channel.title: Decompiling and Recompiling...Help Pls :(
channel.description:
Hi i have decompiled a client.class file on my server so i can edit it, when i decompiled it put it in to a ".java" file that was usable with notepad... i've done all the editing i want to but how do i get it back into a .class file now :S
:confused:

item.title: Decompiling and Recompiling...Help Pls :(
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

There’s a simple solution to this problem. You don’t know Java, fine, you can’t be blamed for that.

However, you’re trying to use Java. So go learn it. Problem solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Decompiling and Recompiling...Help Pls :(

item.description:

dude i came to this forum to learn something about what i’m doing, not get called an idiot by someone who’s oblivious to the people that don’t understand java .

item.title: Decompiling and Recompiling...Help Pls :(
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:11, topic:250772”][quote author=Coder xynt link=topic=330813.msg2584098#msg2584098 date=1229387559]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=330813.msg2583931#msg2583931 date=1229380829]

[quote author=Coder xynt link=topic=330813.msg2583820#msg2583820 date=1229376705]
learn bytecode.
[/quote]What? The? Hell?
[/quote]oh shit. i read thread wrong. i thought he wanted to turn class file into java file in a neat style. >.> my bad.

@OP: just compile it again…
[/quote]He can’t compile it, retard. That’s his problem.

JAD creates dirty ass code in regards to the Runescape client, often un-recompilable. It does it’s best, however.
You would have to deobfuscate it before decomiling.

Also, google is your pal.[/quote]im sure hes talking about the clinet.jvaa from the server, hes just an idiot and doesnt know how to compile java without Mod Taharoks Perfect Compiler

Read full topic

item.title: Decompiling and Recompiling...Help Pls :(
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Coder xynt, post:1, topic:250815”][quote author=the bank link=topic=330813.msg2583931#msg2583931 date=1229380829]

[quote author=Coder xynt link=topic=330813.msg2583820#msg2583820 date=1229376705]
learn bytecode.
[/quote]What? The? Hell?
[/quote]oh shit. i read thread wrong. i thought he wanted to turn class file into java file in a neat style. >.> my bad.

@OP: just compile it again…[/quote]He can’t compile it, retard. That’s his problem.

JAD creates dirty ass code in regards to the Runescape client, often un-recompilable. It does it’s best, however.
You would have to deobfuscate it before decomiling.

Also, google is your pal.

Read full topic
